reviewtext: The title sums it up.  For whatever reason, I can't get these things to sit flat on my head.  The earpieces seem to fit snug at the top of my ear, then lift off my face at the bottom.  This prevents me from getting a good seal, so I get more background noise coming in.  Aside from that, the sound is good, and for the price they perform a lot better than I expected.
summary: Decent sound, not a good fit for my head
